articles.description: Shares in the cosmetic injections and skincare group climbed 3.8 per cent, pushing its market capitalisation to nearly $169 million.
articles.content:
SILK's addressable nonsurgical aesthetics market is estimated to be about $5.4 billion a year.

articles.author: John Collett
articles.title: Australian super funds rank bottom of global rankings on transparency - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Australia is the only market of 26 that do not require super funds and managed funds to disclose their portfolio holdings, a new study reveals.
articles.content:
He says for a country that aspires to be a global financial centre, having sub-standard portfolio disclosures should not only be of concern to small investors, but to all industry participants.
